name: image
doc:
Adds an image to the display. The image must be located within the
assets directory of the Cauldron notebook's folder.

params.name: filename
params.description: Name of the file within the assets directory,

params.name: width
params.description: Optional width in pixels for the image.

params.name: height
params.description: Optional height in pixels for the image.

params.name: justify
params.description:
One of 'left', 'center' or 'right', which specifies how the image
is horizontally justified within the notebook display.
